channel.title: Pimp Ya Client Noobs Tut ftw!
channel.description:
yo allz,
i am going to teach u all to pimp ya clients - its easy!! I am Using Icerealm Client 1st tut so dont b harsh :D :D
Chapter 1 ( ;DMy First Tut ;D)- To Change Your GameFrame!!
Step 1 - ok so you have your client go into Sprites.
choose the sprite you want, say u want...
BACKBASE1 0 which is the bar under the Text box thing with the report button etc etc,
Step 2 - So Open that up Using Adobe Photoshop Cs3 i am using that but u can also use paint u wont get the same product but u can if u want.
go to the Zoom button on the left down near the bottom of the toolbar, then zoom to a comfortable size, then go to Colour Replacement tool and choose a cool colour from the toolbar of colours to the right, i chose light green, so then click on the area's u want that colour then choose as many colours as u want, and yea b imaginative!!
Step 3 - Keep doing that and saving as the same name otherwise it wont work, Example "BACKBASE1 0" Just Click save when ur done, then go find another Sprite and Pimp That 1
Eventually u will Finish them all remember to save it, go to the compiler and compile, then click "Run.Bat" or wteva its called in ur server then type in your user pass and then Server Ip and maybe the Port if u want lol, ;D not very good at explaining things lol ;D
Step 4 - Login and whatever you pimped in sprites folder and saved will now be there!! I Will Post Pics At End of what to do
2Nd Chapter ( ;D2nd Tut ;D) Change Your Login Screen!!!
Step 1 - So you like your gameframe but the loading bit is shit eh?? well follow these instructions to Pimp that too!!
Step 2 - Go to your Client.java And Search wteva words in the loading bit u want like Server Ip to Loading...Music or wteva search it all and normally, well every time u will get something that looks like this @whi@ or @dbl@ or something like that with only 3 letters in it, that basically meens what colour u want i used @gre@ on all of that stuff - I like Green as u will see at the pics down the bottom.
Step 3 - So Save Your Client.java and Compile Now click "Run.bat" or wteva its called on ur server and check out what u did!! remember there is some words in the gameframe that you can change also.
The End Made 100% By I B4RR4G3z I Here's Some Pics!!! ----- O Yea Can Ya Leave Some Feedback If U Used Please...No i Wont Delete it or wteva I Just wna know if it helped ;D ;D-----

item.title: Pimp Ya Client Noobs Tut ftw!
item.dc:creator: @xdragondavyx xdragondavyx
item.description:
@xdragondavyx wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:8, topic:194325”]Umm, wouldnt it be easier (somewhat) to load an image into photoshop, select the region, and use the CTRL+U feature to change the color of the area? Oh well, some people dont have photoshop so i guess with works. Umm, also, there have been many of these tuts around. You failed to hit some important parts though, lets say, if your client uses themes, and how to change the colors of the loadbar (i did a tut on this, just link em there)[/quote] yh lol, i tested but it was sucky, thats why i ask for releasing client…

Read full topic

item.title: Pimp Ya Client Noobs Tut ftw!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Umm, wouldnt it be easier (somewhat) to load an image into photoshop, select the region, and use the CTRL+U feature to change the color of the area? Oh well, some people dont have photoshop so i guess with works. Umm, also, there have been many of these tuts around. You failed to hit some important parts though, lets say, if your client uses themes, and how to change the colors of the loadbar (i did a tut on this, just link em there)

Chapter 1 ( ;DMy First Tut ;D)- To Change Your GameFrame!!
